text: Kazhu, "ya ne mayu potuzhnosti do vyhody sebe, abo shkoda sebe. Tilʹky yakyy BOH wills vidbuvayetʹsya do meni. Yakshcho b ya znav maybutnye, ya by zbilʹshyv moye bahat·stvo, ta niyaka shkoda by ne afflicted meni. YA ne ye bilʹsh nizh warner, ta pred'yavnyk harnoyi novyny dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ
